definitions.body: cave;—abs. ´[[מ]] Ge 19:30 +; cstr. [[מְעָרַת]] Ge 23:19 +; pl. [[מְעָרוֹת]] Ju Jdg 6:2 +, cstr. id. Is 2:19; —cave, esp. as place of sojourn or refuge Ge 19:30 (J), 1Sa 24:3, 1Sa 24:3, 1Sa 24:7, 1Sa 24:8, 1Sa 24:10 (Ginsb; v:4, v:8, v:9, v:11 van d. H. Bear), 1Ki 19:1, 1Ki 19:13, Ez Eze 33:27, Jos 10:16 ([[בַמַּקֵּדָה]] ´[[מ]]) + 7 t. Jos 10, Ju Jdg 6:2, 1Sa 13:6, 1Ki 18:4, 1Ki 18:13, cf. Ps 57:1, Ps 142:1; [[מְעָרוֹת חֻרִים]] Is 2:19, hence [[פָּרִחִים]] ´[[מ]] Je 7:11 robbers' cave; Is 32:14 den (of wild beasts);—[[עֲדֻלָּם]] ´[[מ]] 1Sa 22:1, 2Sa 23:13, whence in ‖ 1Ch 11:15, rd. prob. ´[[מְחֻדַת ע]] or [[מְחָדַת]] We, cf. Dr, Bu Kit HPS;—as burial place, [[הַמַּכְפֵּלָה]] ´[[מ]] Ge 23:9 + (v. [[מַכְפֵּלָה]]) = ´[[מ]] alone Ge 23:11, Ge 23:17, Ge 23:20, Ge 49:29, Ge 49:32 (all P). [[אֲשֶׁר לַצִּידׂנִים]] ´[[מ]] Jos 13:4 (D), cave-region in Lebanon E. of Sidon, mod. Mughâr Ǧezzîn, acc. to most, but dub.; perhaps, rather, near Tyre Buhl:MDPV 1895, 55.
